errors.name: CustomError
errors.msg: Custom error message

errors.name: InvalidAmount
errors.msg: Invalid amount specified.

errors.name: TitleTooLong
errors.msg: Contract title is too long (max 100 characters).

errors.name: NoMilestonesProvided
errors.msg: No milestones provided for the contract.

errors.name: TooManyMilestones
errors.msg: Too many milestones (max 10 allowed).

errors.name: InvalidDeadline
errors.msg: Invalid deadline specified.

errors.name: DisputeResolutionTooLong
errors.msg: Dispute resolution mechanism description is too long (max 200 characters).

errors.name: TermsAndConditionsTooLong
errors.msg: Dispute resolution mechanism description is too long (max 200 characters).

errors.name: ContractNotAccepted
errors.msg: Contract has not been accepted yet.

errors.name: MilestoneAmountMismatch
errors.msg: Milestone amounts do not sum to total contract amount.

errors.name: CalculationError
errors.msg: Calculation error occurred.

errors.name: ContractNotPending
errors.msg: Contract is not in pending status.

errors.name: ContractExpired
errors.msg: Contract has expired.

errors.name: ContractNotInProgress
errors.msg: Contract is not in progress.

errors.name: ContractNotDisputed
errors.msg: Contract is not in disputed status.

errors.name: InvalidMilestoneIndex
errors.msg: Invalid milestone index.

errors.name: MilestoneNotPending
errors.msg: Milestone is not in pending status.

errors.name: MilestoneNotCompleted
errors.msg: Milestone is not completed by service provider.

errors.name: MilestoneNotDisputable
errors.msg: Milestone is not disputable.

errors.name: MilestoneNotDisputed
errors.msg: Milestone is not in disputed status.

errors.name: InvalidDisputeReason
errors.msg: Invalid dispute reason.

errors.name: InvalidResolution
errors.msg: Invalid resolution value.

errors.name: DeadlineTooFar
errors.msg: Deadlin is too far.

errors.name: Unauthorized
errors.msg: You are not authorized to perform this action.

errors.name: UnauthorizedDisputer
errors.msg: Only the payer or recipient can dispute a milestone.

errors.name: UnauthorizedResolver
errors.msg: Only an authorized resolver can resolve a dispute.

errors.name: InvalidRole
errors.msg: Invalid role specified. Must be 0 (payer) or 1 (recipient).

errors.name: InvalidContractType
errors.msg: Invalid contract type. Must be 0 (one-time payment) or 1 (milestone payment).

errors.name: PayerMismatch
errors.msg: Payer Mismatch
